description:
Ikta is a brilliant, but lazy and unmotivated boy.  His childhood friend, a high-ranking daughter of a noble, offers him an easy position at a library if he can help he get the top score on a military exam.  But their lives take a sudden turn when the boat carrying them to the exam runs aground, and Ikta rescues a mysterious girl on board.  When she turns out to be a princess, and they all find themselves behind enemy lines, Ikta is going to start having to work hard for real...
Source: crunchyroll
